channel.title: [PI]Player Right Command[PI]

item.title: [PI]Player Right Command[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

Ok, I want to make a command that makes it so only players with the playerrights 4 can do it?
Here is the command:

[code] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”) && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Owner Player”)){
try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“That item ID does not exist.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Wrong usage: (Ex:(::item_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {

			}
		}[/code]

Instead of only a specific player, how do I make it so only that specific playerright? Thx.
(New to PI ^_^)

Read full topic
